document_data.name: ''Winter Wolf Scarf''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Winter wolf scarves''''' were [[enchanted]] neck wrappings that carried magical properties of [[winter wolves]]' pelt they were made of.
document_data.Powers: These strips of soft white fur granted the wearers resistance to mundane and magical cold. Additionally, the scarves slightly improved the wearers' charisma.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' {{YearlinkName|1281}}, [[Oswald Fiddlebender]] crafted various magic items of clothing using pelts of winter wolves that followed the [[Cultists of Auril]] that plagued [[Icewind Dale]]. Some of other items included ''[[winter wolf cloak]]s'', ''[[winter wolf gloves]]'', ''[[winter wolf hat]]s'', and ''[[winter wolf boots]]''.
